title: Low Power
explanation: Get as low as possible in power

title: Wrong Way
explanation: Inverted movement, W = S and Mouse inverted

title: Rainbow
explanation: Loadout is Raindbow: K:green E:Blue P:Purple

title: One of a kind
explanation: Every weapon is the same type

title: All of One, One of All
Wrong side
explanation: Left hand on mouse, Right had on keyboard. Crossarmed

title: I'm Fast as Fuck Boi
explanation: Don't stop sprinting, Keep moving if shooting

title: Mirror Loadout
explanation: Choose someone to mirror loadout, Dont mention it to the player

title: Special person
explanation: Only allowed to use special ammo

title: I'm Spartacus
explanation: Change name to Spartacus, Entire team

title: What are you saying?!?
explanation: Speak in your native tongue, Entire team

title: Big Big Chungus
explanation: Listen to Big chungus for the remaining raid

title: Season Freak
explanation: Entire loadout is from the same season

title: What am i doing?
explanation: Choose someone who will narrate you. You are only allowed to do what he 'Narrates'
